j i k a space open square brackets table row 2 row 3 row 4 end table close square brackets. space M a k a space n i l a i space a with rightwards arrow on top a d a l a h space...
J a w a b space colon
open vertical bar a close vertical bar equals square root of x squared plus y squared plus z squared end root equals square root of 2 squared plus 3 squared plus 4 squared end root equals square root of 4 plus 9 plus 16 end root equals square root of 29
